name: py-outdated

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
This is a mini-library which, given a package name and a version, checks
if it's the latest version available on PyPI.

dependencies.name: py-littleutils
dependencies.description:
Small personal collection of python utility functions, partly just for
fun.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm
dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.

dependent_to.name: py-ogb
dependent_to.description:
The Open Graph Benchmark (OGB) is a collection of benchmark datasets,
data loaders, and evaluators for graph machine learning. Datasets cover
a variety of graph machine learning tasks and real-world applications.
The OGB data loaders are fully compatible with popular graph deep
learning frameworks, including PyTorch Geometric and Deep Graph Library
(DGL). They provide automatic dataset downloading, standardized dataset
splits, and unified performance evaluation.
